name: Flying Sword
description: A small construct resembling a sword that hovers in the air and attacks under its own power. It can fly swiftly and with precision, easily striking at intruders.
memorable: The Flying Sword can blend in as a normal sword when not in motion, making it a stealthy guardian.
goals: To guard specific areas or objects, attacking any intruders.
relations: Often found in the company of magical constructs and protecting treasure or valuable locations.
environment: Ancient castles, wizard's towers, or places imbued with magic.
strengths: Immunity to poison and psychic damage, resistance to piercing damage, and various condition immunities.
weaknesses: Susceptible to demolishing magic like dispel magic and incapacitated within an antimagic field.
attacks: Performs a melee weapon attack with its longsword that deals slashing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Antimagic Susceptibility, rendering it incapacitated within an antimagic field.
senses: Has blindsight out to 60 feet, allowing it to perceive nearby creatures but not beyond that range.
skills: No special skills, but has average stealth capabilities when motionless.
additional_information: Relentlessly attacks based on simple commands set by its creator.
Capable of flying and hovering without requiring rest or sustenance.
Can make a last-ditch attack when reduced to low hit points using Whirling Blade.
test_queries: animated sword that flies and attacks
magical sword that blends in as normal
